faq.question: How accurate is the OCR?
faq.answer: Our OCR technology has 99%+ accuracy on standard scanned documents. Even with poor quality scans, accuracy typically exceeds 95%.

faq.question: Can it handle handwritten documents?
faq.answer: We support printed text OCR. Handwriting recognition has limited support - works best with clear, legible handwriting.

faq.question: What languages are supported?
faq.answer: Currently optimized for English. Support for Spanish, French, German, and other major languages coming soon.

faq.question: Do you keep the original scanned PDF?
faq.answer: Yes! We extract text and create summaries while preserving your original scanned file. You get both.

faq.question: Can I batch process multiple scanned files?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support batch upload. Process hundreds of scanned documents at once.

faq.question: What's the pricing for OCR summaries?
faq.answer: Same as regular summaries! Free: 5/month. Starter ($9/mo): 50/month. Pro ($19/mo): 200/month with batch processing.
